resources.string: You are about to leave the group. You may rejoin later unless the group owner permanently removes you.
You are about to delete your group. This action cannot be undone.
You are about to rejoin the group.
Please supply a name for your group.
Please add at least one other member to your group.
There was a problem loading your group. Please check your network connectivity and try again.
There was a problem saving your group. Please check your network connectivity and try again.
There was a problem with your group. Please check your network connectivity and try again.
There was a problem updating your group. Please check your network connectivity and try again.
There was a problem leaving the group. Please check your network connectivity and try again.
There was a problem rejoining the group. Please check your network connectivity and try again.
You will no longer receive messages from this group chat. If you write back after leaving this chat you will start a new chat session with the recipients.
You have left this chat. If you send them another message, you will start a new chat session with the recipients.
Create AKAs to post on sites like Craigslist or apps like WhosHere
Chat with a friend or a group of friends
Send texts, pics, videos and voice messages
No charge to send or receive EMwithME messages
Forget auto-correct - just Take it Back
Take any EMwithME message back at anytime so you can always say what you mean
Please confirm your country and enter your email address to continue.
Please confirm your country and enter your mobile phone number to continue.
A verification code has been sent to you.
Please validate your account by clicking this link on your mobile phone.
Please validate your account by entering this code:\u0020\u0020%1$s
Or, if you are using your mobile device you used to sign up with, you can simply click
Click here to validate your account if you are on your mobile device.
There was a problem registering your account with the email address you provided.
There was a problem registering your account with the mobile phone number you provided.
Verification failed. Please make sure you entered the verification code correctly and try again.
You are receiving this email because you recently registered with EMwithME. If this was a mistake, please use the unsubscribe link below.
Would you like to download your old messages?\n\nNOTE: This could take a while.
EMwithME needs access to your address book so you can look-up your friends by name in the app.
Welcome to EMwithME! Please go to the Profile page and add your First and Last Name. You can send unlimited EMwithME messages, photos and videos to all your friends - for free!
%1$s just joined EMwithME! Send a message to welcome them.
%1$s has added you to the group %2$s. Send a message to the group.
%1$s has removed you from the group %2$s.
%1$s has added %2$s to the group %3$s. Send a message to the group.
One or more parties in this conversation are no longer reachable. You can review the conversation history but no new messages can be sent.
Voice messaging is currently disabled. Go to Apple\'s Settings app > Settings > Privacy > Microphone to enable this feature.
No images were found. Enter a new search term and try again.
There was an error performing your search. Please try again.
There was an error while processing this video. Please try again.
There was an error processing the image you selected. Please try again.
You must first register with EMwithME before you can share media.
Please give EMwithME permission to access photos in order to share them!
Sent via EMwithME. Visit us @ http://EMwith.ME
You have a new EMwithME message from %1$s
You have a new EMwithME notification
Want to write %1$s back? Just hit reply and send them an email or download EMwithME.
Want to write %1$s back? Just hit reply and send them an email or download EMwithME.
You have a new EMwithME message waiting for you! Please visit us @ http://EMwith.ME to get the app and read your message.
You have been sent a media message. Please install EMwithME to view.
You have been sent a photo. Please install EMwithME to view.
You have been sent a video. Please install EMwithME to view.
You have been sent a voice message. Please install EMwithME to view.
%1$s has sent you a media message. Please install EMwithME to view.
%1$s has sent you a photo. Please install EMwithME to view.
%1$s has sent you a video. Please install EMwithME to view.
%1$s has sent you a voice message. Please install EMwithME to view.
Hide removes the message from your local conversation history.\u0020\u0020It cannot be undone.
Take it Back will delete the message from your device and that of the recipient(s).
You have been sent a media message.
You have been sent a photo.
You have been sent a video.
You have been sent a voice message.
%1$s has sent you a media message.
%1$s has sent you a voice message.
You left your Name blank. We will use {0} as your Name.
We didn\'t detect any supported sharing apps installed on your device. Currently, we are only able to share via Instagram. If you would like to share your profile, install Instagram and try again.

We didn\'t detect any supported sharing apps installed on your device. Currently, we are only able to share via Instagram, Twitter and Facebook. If you would like to share your profile, install one of these apps and try again.
Message me on EMwithME! My screen name is {0}. Free for iOS & Android. @EMTheApp #{0} #EMwithME
{0} has been added to your contacts.

AKAs (Also Known As) are disposable, public and unique. You can use them to message other users without disclosing identifying information like your name or mobile number. Would you like to setup an AKA?
This AKA is already taken. Please choose another one.
This AKA is too short. Please choose an AKA longer than five characters.
This AKA is not valid. Please choose another one.
AKAs cannot be phone numbers. Please choose another one.
AKAs cannot be email addresses. Please choose another one.
This AKA contains invalid characters (such as spaces, @ or dots). Please choose another one.
An error occurred when processing your AKA. Please try again.
Deleting this AKA will mean that you can no longer send or receive messages with that account. Are you sure you want to delete it?
This AKA has been deleted, it will remain reserved for 24 hours before it is available for another user. You can reclaim this AKA any time during that time.
Your AKA has been deleted. You can review the conversation history but no new messages can be sent.
Copyright (c) 2015 WhosHere, Inc. All Rights Reserved. EM and EMwithME are trademarks of WhosHere, Inc.
Would you like to send invitation(s) via SMS?
Would you like to send invitation(s) via Email?
Your device cannot send SMS messages.
Your device cannot send Email messages.
Hey! I\'m using EMwithME, a new messaging app that I\'d like you to try. Check it out at http://EMwith.ME

Hey! I\'m using EMwithME, a new messaging app that I\'d like you to try.


Check it out at http://EMwith.ME
There was an error sending your invitation(s). Please try again.
Your email invitation(s) were saved as drafts.
Would you like to link EMwithME with your WhosHere account to earn free points?
Welcome to EMwithME, the best messaging app for connecting with friends as well as protecting your identity.
Welcome to EMwithME! We see that you are a WhosHere user, thanks for trying EMwithME.

Welcome to EMwithME! We see that you are a WhosHere user, and will reward you with %1$s points in WhosHere every time you receive a message from a new EMwithME user. So, be sure to invite your friends!
Did you know with EMwithME you can create AKAs that allow you to protect your personal information? AKAs are disposable screen names you can send and receive messages from.

WhosHere and EMwithME can work together seamlessly. When your accounts are linked it allows users to chat with you in EMwithME or WhosHere. With EMwithME, an AKA can be used to keep your personal information private. You choose if and when you share personal information like an email address or phone number.
You\'ve reached the current maximum number of AKAs, you need to delete an existing one before creating a new one.

You created an AKA. Now what? As long as someone knows your AKA they can write you by typing your AKA name in the \'To\' field. You can also write anyone from your AKA. Just select your AKA on \'From\' line when you start a new conversation.

Did you know, with EMwithME, you can send messages to friends who don\'t even have EMwithME? All you need is their email address or mobile phone number. You can create a group of friends and send them all messages and it does not matter if some, or all, of them have EMwithME!

You\'ve create your first Group! This group will show up in your EMwithME Contacts List, and in all the group member\'s Contacts List as well. Even group members who haven\'t joined EMwithME will receive an SMS or email message when you write to the group.

You\'ve been added to a group by one of your friends. You\'ll now receive messages sent to this group and any replies you write will be sent to everyone. This group will appear in your Contacts List, so to write the group just start typing its name. If you ever decide you want to leave the group you can control that from the Groups page.

With EMwithME you are in control. Don\'t like being on a group message? You can leave any group conversation, whether it be a formal group created by friends or just a message addressed to multiple people. Just go to the \'Details\' of that conversation to remove yourself.
With EMwithME you can take back messages you\'ve sent other EMwithME users. Just long press the message you sent and select \'Take it Back\'.
I\'m going to take back this message.
Now your turn. Send me a message, then long press it to Take it Back.
